Note: Old message is Override Emergency Alert About
ABSTRACT

 Now a day’s both parent are working outside for their respective job, so because of this no one is with their child who can keep observation like whether child is coming safely from school or not, whether child is happy at school atmosphere or not etc. The proposed system includes a child module which have a gazette with GPS and parent module which includes mobile phone (which supports internet connectivity) for getting the information about the missed child on periodical basis. Addition to the proposed system is that parents don’t have to continuously monitor the location of child, if child is going outside of define area then alert message will be given to parents. Child module have one panic switch, with the help of which child can alert parents These proposed tracking devices can be worn as wrist watches, anklets or in identity-cards. The child module is a hardware based using Arduino, GPS and GSM.

 Even though if the child is not aware that if he/she is in danger the app will notify the parents if the child goes out of a certain defined region outside of his school and home. 
In this way the child can be located if he/she goes missing. 

 INTRODUCTION

 Now a day’s both parents of a child are working. It is not possible for them to keep an eye on the child every time. But the parents must have to ensure that the child is fine. Usually a small child of 7 or 8 year old can be present in certain defined region. The child can be present around his house, or on the way to his school, nearby neighbors’ home, playground and or park near to his house. A kid of age 15-16 years can go to his/her friends’ home, tutorial classes, and nearby areas for shopping and other activities.


There are many cases when children go missing or are kidnapped. There are many such incidences when it becomes a problem for the parents and the local police to track a child. They face a lot of difficulty during the search process because it is very difficult to find evidences of where the child can be.


The solution demands for a system or a technique with help of which it becomes easy to locate the position of an individual. The project is about a software-hardware embedded system where a device is used to identify the location (geocoordinates) and software application is used to control and monitor the coordinated being send by the device. The project is consist of two parts the parent module and the child module. The parent module is consist of an android app to plot the child’s position sent by the child module . 

The child module uses Arduino mini, a Global Positioning System (GPS) and a Global System for mobile communication (GSM) to track the child’s location. The GPS will continuously send the location of the child to the server in the regular interval of time.


Then the GSM will allow the Arduino to connect to the internet and send the location of the child in the form of a SMS. 

 Thankyou!
